meta.description: Language labels for the Extension Builder extension

languageKey.label: An extension key must have minimum 3, maximum 30 characters (not counting underscores)
Illegal character(s) in extension key. Allowed characters are: a-z (lowercase), 0-9 and '_' (underscore)
The key may not begin with one of the following prefixes: tx,u,user_,pages,tt_,sys_,ts_language_,csh_
Extension keys cannot start or end with 0-9 and '_' (underscore)
There is an existing piBased extension with this extension key. Please choose another extension key or rename the existing extension directory
Name
Key
Extension title
Extension Key
The extensionkey should be lowercase and without spaces. It will be the unique identifier for this extension.

Priority
This tells the EM to try to load the extension as the very first or last of all extensions. Possible values: top or bottom
Shy
If the extension is marked as shy, it won't be displayed in the extension manager by default

Value objects are simple objects that are defined by their value and have no 'identity'

Is aggregate root?
If true, the extension builder will generate a repository and default controller actions for this model
Default actions
Action type

For each selected action, the extension builder will generate a template and a action method in the controller of this model. If the model is an aggregate root the default CRUD actions will be generated per default.
